Vulois

Vulois was amazed and taken aback by what he heard. He was a 
Predacon? And than he wanted peace? He was gifted by the Matrix? This 
was all too much. And Battera had a point. No peace would come untill 
the Alliance won the war. And he had to help them. He didn't realize 
that this was the programming talking. Deep within Vulois, his 
original programming fought the chains, and seemed to be succeding, 
but this reassurane Battera put in about the Alliance drove it back 
and his current programming stayed in control. He looked up at them, 
amazed.

"Thank You for telling me the truth. And you sharkbot. What is your 
name? I'm sure I knew once upon a time, but I can't recall now." Than 
one of the things Battera had said clicked in him. "Cybertron? Did 
you say Cybertron? I wanted to go back to Cybertron. That means....if 
the old me was going back, than there must be a way I discovered. It 
must be buried within my Alliance Programming! We could all go home!"
